attributes.action: change the law to make parents/guardians legally accountable for the actions and behaviour of their children until the age of 16 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of increases in youth violence
we request that the House changes the law to make parents/guardians fully responsible for the actions and behaviours of their children. Parents and their children should be held jointly accountable and be jointly punished  for any illegal activity or unsociable behaviour conducted by a child under the age of 16 years.
